channel.title: Command help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I downloaded Rune-Evo and tbh it's quite nice, apart from idk where the hell the commands are and I've accidently done ::setdisplay asdjsbfsjdfsdf...
I tried to type ::removedisplay and I just get a big error on the server: [img]http://gyazo.com/d6b9ad3a1d6594b8c2033aef9ce79b3d.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/d90f54b09401eb5f97a2afd49048efc0.png[/img]
Any help would be much appreciated, or any advice of getting a different source :)

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:11, topic:482650”][quote author=dzeko link=topic=600883.msg4218047#msg4218047 date=1360520943]
I highly recommand PI 474 sources for beginners. Those are really easy to start with
[/quote]
PI’s are 317…[/quote]
PI is a 317 server but I’m sure a 474 client can be made compatible to work with it.

[quote=“noty, post:9, topic:482650”][quote author=VorargC link=topic=600883.msg4218660#msg4218660 date=1360562683]
Looks like the commands are in com.rs.player.content.commands

And you are getting that error because the removedisplay command probably takes an argument and you didn’t provide one which would make the argument null.
[/quote]
#1 NERD??[/quote]
Having knowledge is not being a nerd. But with what you said, I’d rather be a nerd than someone who doesn’t know much at all.

Read full topic
